channel.title: Design on Tyler Mumford
channel.description: Recent content in Design on Tyler Mumford

item.title: SUU to Everywhere
item.description: When the marketing department asked us to build a site for their newest campaign, “SUU to Everywhere,” I implemented the CMS page types and the CSS for the site’s design. SUU to Everywhere front page At the time, our site didn’t really have anything like this. A coworker and I planned a way for the new code to be reusable in other areas (specifically the university news).
